channel.title: CVE Feed for newsletter2go -- Newsletter2Go
channel.description: The latest CVEs for newsletter2go -- Newsletter2Go

item.title: CVE-2024-1328|2024-03-12T08:34:16.896Z -- newsletter2go -- Newsletter2Go
item.description: The Newsletter2Go plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘style’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.13 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
